**Example 1: 检查区块链信息**



Input: 

```
tccli tdid CheckChain --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --ClusterId xx \
    --GroupId 1 \
    --AgencyName xx
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RoleType": 1,
        "ChainId": "bcos-fmtkyt8xne",
        "AppName": "tesaba4",
        "RequestId": "41a9acae-cef4-4949-b144-48c65ad5e425"
    }
}
```
